mapper.select: SELECT a.division_no , a.item , a.contents FROM division a
SELECT a.admin_no , a.name , a.id , a.use_active FROM admin_user a WHERE a.id = #{idVal} AND a.pass = #{passVal}

SELECT a.chain_no , a.chain_name , b.product_no , b.menu_name , b.single_price , b.set_price , b.calory , b.img_url , b.display_yn , b.category FROM chain_store a INNER JOIN products b ON a.chain_no = b.chain_no
SELECT a.display_no , a.display_type , a.name , a.img_url , a.priority FROM display a WHERE a.display_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY a.priority asc
SELECT a.display_no , a.display_type , a.name , a.display_yn , a.img_url , a.priority FROM display a
